Name: Holland House (Genever-based)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Genever adds its own complexity to this Dutch version of the classic Holland House.
History: This genever-based version of The Holland House was practically unknown before 2008 but it has since been rescued from obscurity.
Nutrition: One serving of Holland House (Genever-based) contains 129 calories
